S1 - pH
var init
func:
flow.set("pHValue",0)
flow.set("Voltage",0)
flow.set("TankName","pH")
flow.set("NutralVolt",msg.payload.NutralVolt)
flow.set("AcidVolt",msg.payload.AcidVolt)
flow.set("LastCalib4",msg.payload.LastCalib4)
flow.set("LastCalib7",msg.payload.LastCalib7)

name: 7 pH calibration input
format:
<html>
<body>
<style>

</style>  
<form id="MobileNoForm" ng-submit="submitlist()" ng-repeat="Details in recipients" align="justify">
 7pH calibration     

<input type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" value="7pH Calibrate" ng-style="{float: 'right', background: '#54e18a', color:'Black',padding: '4px 6px', border: 'none', cursor: 'allowed'}"/>
</form>
<script>
	(function(scope) {   	
  scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
    if (msg) {
    	
      $("#my_"+scope.$id).html(msg.payload);
scope.data = angular.copy(msg.payload); 
    }
scope.recipients = angular.copy(scope.data);
    
  });

scope.enabledEdit = [];	
//scope.data = [{ Name:""}]; 
//scope.recipients = angular.copy(scope.data);
	  
scope.submitlist = function(){
var msg={"payload":(scope.recipients),"Type":"Submit"};
scope.send(msg);
window.confirm("Sensor Calibrated for 7 pH");
console.log("form submitted:"+angular.toJson(scope.recipients));

}
})(scope);
</script>            
</body>
</html>

name: Setting Nutral Voltage Referance
Setting Acid Voltage Referance
Clear Calibration input
format:
<html>
<body>
<style>

</style>  
<form id="MobileNoForm" ng-submit="submitlist()" ng-repeat="Details in recipients" align="justify">
clear calibration     


<input type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" value="Clear" ng-style="{float: 'right', background: '#54e18a', color:'Black',padding: '4px 6px', border: 'none', cursor: 'allowed'}"/>
</form>
<script>
	(function(scope) {   	
  scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
    if (msg) {
    	
      $("#my_"+scope.$id).html(msg.payload);
//scope.data = angular.copy(msg.payload); 
    }
//scope.recipients = angular.copy(scope.data);
    
  });

scope.enabledEdit = [];	
scope.data = [{ Name:""}]; 
scope.recipients = angular.copy(scope.data);
	  
scope.submitlist = function(){
var msg={"payload":(scope.recipients),"Type":"Submit"};
scope.send(msg);
window.confirm("Calibration cleared for selected sensor");
console.log("form submitted:"+angular.toJson(scope.recipients));

}
})(scope);
</script>            
</body>
</html>

name: Clear Voltage Referance
V R Phase
S1 - Temperature
func:
msg.label = "Panel Temperature"
msg.value = msg.payload.data[1]
global.set("Machine1Temp", msg.payload.data[1].toFixed(2))
global.set("sensorData[1]", msg.payload.data[1].toFixed(2))
return msg;
